name: Goblinsss!
description:
My first game jam game and also my first game. Soooooooooooooo! 

What did you say? , How to play?

Its so frickin simple! 

you use "A" and  "D" to move and left and right


and "SPACEBAR" to Jump.


Easy Right?

Types of Enemies ( at the moment )

 Fighter goblins : 
they're clingy and i hate it, also they slaps the heck out of you when you don't dodge them attacks, you can dodge attacks just by dodging it get it? dodging , funny right? but yeah just go back and forth so he cant slap you or just jump..,  you choose its not my problem .

Door Addicted Goblins : 
they just bang the doors til it breaks be careful with dis guys, don't let em destroy the door, why you said? because its your job duh. you're supposed to protect the hidden villagers behind that door when the door breaks its all over.. get it? be careful with dis guys.
